A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Skywalker saga ended with Return of the Jedi\, this is a fresh new trilogy and I don't even think Rey will come out on top of the next film.  They are setting up the next trilogy splendidly\, with the promise of new Force users\, not constricted by the rules of any order.   I find it strange that people are judging this trilogy when it hasn't been completed yet.
